content:
SerializerOption Enum

Definition

A class that represents the types of serializers available.

In this Article

public enum SerializerOption
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
SerializerOption

Fields

DataContractSerializer

Specifies that the DataContractSerializer should be used when serializing.
XmlSerializer

Specifies that the XmlSerializer should be used when serializing.
